targets.query:
from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P1" or r["_field"] == "P2" or r["_field"] == "P3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:            
                    if r._value >= 0.2 then r._value   // more than 200mW
                    else 0.0}))
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: float(v: r.elapsed)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: if r.elapsed > 60.0 then 60.0           //TEST previous measurement
                        else r.elapsed}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_Ws: r._value * r.elapsed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_kWh: r.power_Ws / 3600000.0}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "power_kWh")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with power_kWh: r.P1 + r.P2 + r.P3 }))
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, column: "power_kWh")
  

  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P1" or r["_field"] == "P2" or r["_field"] == "P3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:
                    if r._value >= 0.2 then r._value
                    else 0.0}))
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: float(v: r.elapsed)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: if r.elapsed > 60.0 then 60.0           //TEST
                        else r.elapsed}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_Ws: r._value * r.elapsed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_kWh: r.power_Ws / 3600000.0}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "power_kWh")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with power_kWh: r.P1 + r.P2 + r.P3 }))
  |> timeShift(duration: -23h) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, column: "power_kWh")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P1" or r["_field"] == "P2" or r["_field"] == "P3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:
                    if r._value < -0.2 then r._value
                    else 0.0}))
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: float(v: r.elapsed)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: if r.elapsed > 60.0 then 60.0           //TEST
                        else r.elapsed}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_Ws: r._value * r.elapsed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_kWh: r.power_Ws / 3600000.0}))
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "power_kWh")    
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with power_kWh: r.P1 + r.P2 + r.P3 }))
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: sum, column: "power_kWh")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P1" or r["_field"] == "P2" or r["_field"] == "P3")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value:
                    if r._value < -0.2 then r._value
                    else 0.0}))
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: float(v: r.elapsed)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with elapsed: if r.elapsed > 60.0 then 60.0           //TEST
                        else r.elapsed}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_Ws: r._value * r.elapsed }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with power_kWh: r.power_Ws / 3600000.0}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "power_kWh")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with power_kWh: r.P1 + r.P2 + r.P3 }))
  |> timeShift(duration: -23h)     
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, column: "power_kWh")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "P1" or r["_field"] == "P2" or r["_field"] == "P3")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
//  |> aggregateWindow(every: 60s, fn: mean)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Ptot: r.P1 + r.P2 + r.P3}))
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])  
 // |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "U1" or r["_field"] == "U2" or r["_field"] == "U3")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "I1" or r["_field"] == "I2" or r["_field"] == "I3" or r["_field"] == "I4")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"]) 
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "F1" or r["_field"] == "F2" or r["_field"] == "F3")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Ec1" or r["_field"] == "Ec2" or r["_field"] == "Ec3")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Ec_tot: r.Ec1 + r.Ec2 + r.Ec3}))
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
     //|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "meteringdata")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Ep1" or r["_field"] == "Ep2" or r["_field"] == "Ep3")
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with Ep_tot: r.Ep1 + r.Ep2 + r.Ep3}))
  |> drop(columns: ["mac","_start", "_stop", "type"])
